Long Distance

Long distance moves are based on moving location, size of the move and other variables. We are able to provide the same level of care, service and excellence for long distance moves as we provide for our local moves.

Get A Free Quote

International

With international moves, you have a lot more considerations to think about than with local or interstate moves. With Above Average Movers, we have you covered! Our long distance/international division, Peach Worldwide Van Lines, is specially equipped to facilitate your move across the border or overseas, and our trained full-time staff will offer the same level of excellence, care and service that we’ve become known for in the Atlanta area.

From inventory to securing visas, from customs paperwork to securing the proper insurance, our relocation experts will talk you through every detail to make sure you have everything in order before your big moving day arrives. If you can’t take all your belongings with you, we’ll store your furniture and belongings in our military-approved storage facility, taking special care to pack, pad and shrink wrap your furniture so it stays in the top condition while it’s being stored. Our dedicated packing staff can also make sure your belongings are properly wrapped and packed to ensure safe passage. And if things seem confusing at any stage of the move, our staff is available 24-7 to answer your questions and help keep things on track for you.

An international move is a big life change, no matter how you slice it. Among the many stresses are involved in the move, safe transport of your precious belongings shouldn’t be one of them. There’s a reason why we have one of the lowest claims rates in the industry: there’s not a single person in our chain of custody who is not expertly trained in the safe handling of your goods. We are the moving company you can trust! For a free estimate on your international move, call Above Average Movers at 770-447-5121.
